titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the dollar limitation on the exclusion under section 911 of such Code.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the amount of foreign earned income which a U.S. resident living abroad may exclude from gross income and provides an inflation adjustment for such amount.
